title: Thursday, July 27, 2017
description: The president says transgender people will not be allowed to serve in the military. The military says that’s news to them. Plus: What exactly Is a ‘skinny repeal’? Guests: Carl Hulse, who covers Congress for The Times; Helene Cooper, a Pentagon correspondent; Staff Sgt. Ashlee Bruce of the Air Force. For more information on today’s episode, visit http://nyti.ms/2f45niU.
author: thedaily@nytimes.com (The New York Times)
